content: First of all, who really cares about the message? It’s a drink commercial for a beverage that causes more harm in America than almost anything. Second, the message I got from it was that not all police are scum, or evil. Most of them are just doing their job and deserve respect like everyone else. Of course, that is a sacrilegious opinion in our SJW infested, identity politics ridden world. The fact that this commercial has angered so many people just shows the outrage culture and how heavily influenced the mainstream is by the regressive left.
